com.ecs.utils
Class PreServiceFilter

java.lang.Object
  com.ecs.utils.PreServiceFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
intradoc.shared.FilterImplementor
public class PreServiceFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements intradoc.shared.FilterImplementor

Attached to the afterInitLocale filter event, so the doFilter method is invoked at the start of every service call, after the user's locale has been resolved. The purpose of the filter is to add the content server version to the DataBinder when any service is executed and add the username to the Log context if logging is set to output the user name. If the server version

tm
